homePage.fhirServerDesc: Hapi Fhir Server provides a Database Schema and an API for CRUD operations on FHIR resources.
homePage.usersDesc: All users that have register their data on the system. Personal data (name and surname) are saved as hashed values to ensure anonymity.
homePage.fhirObservationDesc: Fhir observation represents a measurement. For this app vitals signs like heart rate, blood pressure, blood gluccose and Oxygen saturation are represented.
homePage.fhirDevicesDesc: Fhir resource of type Device repesents the instrument which carried out the measurement.
homePage.searchDesc: This application supports search for a variety of Fhir resources.

filters.header: Search results for specific user and time period

infoMessage: Found _recordsLength_ records for user with id: _userId_ from _startDate_ to _endDate_
